SELECT VIQ_CODE_NAME_ID, VIQ_CODE_NAME, DESCRIPTION, DESCRIPTION_ENG, ORDER_NO,
DELETE_FLAG, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, CREATE_MS_USER_ID, UPDATE_MS_USER_ID
FROM MS_VIQ_CODE_NAME
WHERE DELETE_FLAG = False

INSERT INTO MS_VIQ_CODE_NAME( VIQ_CODE_NAME, DESCRIPTION, DESCRIPTION_ENG, ORDER_NO, DELETE_FLAG, UPDATE_MS_USER_ID, CREATE_MS_USER_ID ) VALUES( :VIQ_CODE_NAME, :DESCRIPTION, :DESCRIPTION_ENG, :ORDER_NO, :DELETE_FLAG, :UPDATE_MS_USER_ID, :CREATE_MS_USER_ID )

UPDATE MS_VIQ_CODE_NAME SET VIQ_CODE_NAME = :VIQ_CODE_NAME, DESCRIPTION = :DESCRIPTION, DESCRIPTION_ENG = :DESCRIPTION_ENG, ORDER_NO = :ORDER_NO, DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG, UPDATE_MS_USER_ID = :UPDATE_MS_USER_ID
WHERE VIQ_CODE_NAME_ID = :VIQ_CODE_NAME_ID
